data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Free kick for Sevilla in their own half.
In the minute 1, Gabriel Paulista is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Sevilla are pushing forward but Joan Jordan's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Valencia goal kick.
In the minute 4, Gabriel Paulista returns to the field for Valencia after picking up a slight injury.
Valencia have a goal kick.
Sevilla's Lucas Ocampos breaks free at Mestalla. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 8, It's a goal kick for the home team in Valencia.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Valencia to check on Gabriel Paulista, who is grimacing with pain.
In Valencia Sevilla attack through Suso. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 10, Valentin Pizarro Gomez awards Valencia a goal kick.
Valencia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gabriel Paulista is back on the pitch.
In the minute 13, Throw-in Valencia.
Valencia's Denis Cheryshev gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sevilla defender.
Sevilla needs to be cautious. Valencia have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 17, The home team have replaced Gabriel Paulista with Guillem Molina. This is the first substitution made today by Javi Gracia.
Goal kick for Sevilla at Mestalla.
Sevilla's Lucas Ocampos gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 19, Ball goes out of play for a Valencia goal kick.
Corner awarded to Sevilla.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
In the minute 21, Sevilla awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Sevilla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valencia's half?
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Valencia close to the penalty box.
In Valencia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Valencia in their own half.
In the minute 27, Free kick Valencia.
Goncalo Guedes for Valencia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Valencia.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Sevilla in the half of Valencia.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a Valencia throw-in in Sevilla's half.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 29, Important block from the Valencia defence as Luuk De Jong fires in a strike for Sevilla.
Throw-in for Sevilla at Mestalla.
Sevilla push forward at Mestalla and Suso gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Valencia defence.
In the minute 31, Valencia have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Sevilla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez awards Valencia a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Sevilla advance rapidly upfield but Valentin Pizarro Gomez blows for offside.
Can Sevilla capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Valencia's half?
Goal kick for Valencia at Mestalla.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
Jose Luis Gaya of Valencia smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Valencia have been awarded a corner by Valentin Pizarro Gomez.
In the minute 36, It's a goal kick for the away team in Valencia.
Sevilla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sevilla have a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Can Valencia capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Valencia drive upfield and Goncalo Guedes gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sevilla defender.
Free kick for Valencia in the half of Sevilla.
In the minute 42, Sevilla to take a throw-in in Valencia territory.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
Sevilla will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Valencia.
In the minute 45, Valencia have been awarded a corner by Valentin Pizarro Gomez.
Maxi Gomez of Valencia gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Sevilla at Mestalla.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Valencia.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a free kick to Sevilla.
Valencia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Valencia drives forward and Denis Cheryshev gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 45, Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a throw-in for Valencia, close to Sevilla's area.
The first-half is over at Mestalla.
In the minute 45, Daniel Wass is booked for the home team.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Sevilla in the half of Valencia.
Free kick in a good position for Sevilla!
Sevilla's Oscar is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 48, In Valencia Sevilla attack through Joan Jordan. The finish is off target, however.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez awards Valencia a goal kick.
Throw-in Valencia.
In the minute 49, Free kick Valencia.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a free kick to Sevilla in their own half.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a free kick to Valencia.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Sevilla at Mestalla.
Throw-in high up the field for Sevilla in Valencia.
In Valencia, Denis Cheryshev of Valencia is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Valencia.
In Valencia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
Luuk De Jong (Sevilla) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Sevilla in their own half.
Throw-in for Sevilla in the half of Valencia.
In the minute 57, Sevilla to take a throw-in in Valencia territory.
Ball safe as Sevilla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Julen Lopetegui is making the team's first substitution at Mestalla with Youssef En-Nesyri replacing Luuk De Jong.
In the minute 60, Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
Sevilla's Suso gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Valencia defender.
Corner awarded to Sevilla.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez awards the home team a throw-in.
Sevilla awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, Valencia's Goncalo Guedes gets in a shot on goal at Mestalla. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sevilla have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Valencia goal kick.
In the minute 68, Sevilla have been awarded a corner by Valentin Pizarro Gomez.
Sevilla are coming forward and Youssef En-Nesyri gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Valencia.
In the minute 69, Javi Gracia (Valencia) is making a second substitution, with Alex Blanco replacing Jose Luis Gaya.
Yunus Musah is replacing Denis Cheryshev for Valencia at Mestalla.
Ivan Rakitic is replacing Oscar for the away team.
In the minute 69, The away team have replaced Jesus Navas with Aleix Vidal. This is the third substitution made today by Julen Lopetegui.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a free kick to Valencia.
Carlos Soler (Valencia) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 73, Can Sevilla capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Valencia's half?
Sevilla have been awarded a corner by Valentin Pizarro Gomez.
Youssef En-Nesyri (Sevilla) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 74, Valencia have a goal kick.
Throw-in Sevilla.
Joan Jordan (Sevilla) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 76, Youssef En-Nesyri (Sevilla) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Valencia defenders.
Sevilla's Joan Jordan gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Valencia goal kick.
In the minute 76, Valencia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Youssef En-Nesyri of Sevilla is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Sevilla in the half of Valencia.
Guillem Molina (Valencia) gets a yellow card.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
Valencia have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 81, Goal! Suso gives Sevilla a 0-1 lead.
Great play from Joan Jordan to set up the goal.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a free kick to Valencia just outside Sevilla's area.
Maxi Gomez (Valencia) strikes at Mestalla but his header is cleared.
In the minute 83, Joan Jordan (Sevilla) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 84, Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Javi Gracia is making the team's fourth substitution at Mestalla with Manu Vallejo replacing Eliaquim Mangala.
Ball safe as Sevilla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Valencia at Mestalla.
In the minute 86, Sevilla make their fourth substitution with Munir El Haddadi replacing Suso.
Julen Lopetegui (Sevilla) is making a fifth substitution, with Nemanja Gudelj replacing Joan Jordan.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a Sevilla throw-in in Valencia's half.
In the minute 88, Youssef En-Nesyri for Sevilla gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Valentin Pizarro Gomez awards Valencia a goal kick.
Throw-in for Valencia in their own half.
In the minute 89, Valentin Pizarro Gomez signals a throw-in for Sevilla, close to Valencia's area.
Corner awarded to Sevilla.
Munir El Haddadi of Sevilla gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Valencia at Mestalla.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Valencia.
Fernando has recovered and rejoins the match in Valencia.
Free kick for Sevilla in their own half.
Valencia needs to be cautious. Sevilla have an attacking throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Valencia.
The match is over. Final score 0-1.
Attention is being given to Sevilla’s Fernando and play has been suspended briefly.
